Rai's H7437102 Nissan Skyline 2000GT-R (KPGC10) 1971 Fuji Masters 250km 10th Place M. Kitano

Purchased: 2015
Manufacturer page: http://www.hiko7plus.co.jp/item/H7437102/

See here for details on the race. Despite qualifying 3rd, Moto Kitano finished in a commendable 10th place due to wiper failure. If you've seen any video from the previous link you'll see wipers were a necessity for that race. :shock:

Kitano continued racing until 1989 and then focused on his duties as owner of Tire Shop Wolf Moto. Seems kind of fitting since he started his racing career on motorcycles, winning the inaugural US Motorcycle GP at Daytona in 1961.
